## Sec256k1Provider.publicKey() method

Gets public key by kmsKeyId

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyId | [KmsKeyId](./js-sdk.kmskeyid.md) | key identifier |
